item.title: Install redis cluster with docker-compose
item.description: 创建目录 mkdir -p /usr/local/docker-redis/redis-cluster 切换至指定目录 cd /usr/local/docker-redis/redis-cluster/ 编写 redis-cluster.tmpl 文件 vi redis-cluster.tmpl port ${PORT} requirepass 1234 masterauth 1234 protected-mode no daemonize no appendonly yes cluster-enabled yes cluster-config-file nodes.conf cluster-node-timeout 15000 cluster-announce-ip 192.168.10.10 cluster-announce-port ${PORT} cluster-announce-bus-port 1${PORT} port ${PORT} requirepass 1234 masterauth 1234 protected-mode no daemonize no appendonly yes cluster-enabled yes cluster-config-file nodes.conf cluster-node-timeout 15000 cluster-announce-ip 192.168.10.11 cluster-announce-port ${PORT} cluster-announce-bus-port
